Original:
2024.07.19

氣氛優美、適合約會聚餐或是不知道去哪裡的朋友。沒有用餐時間限制，低消也只要$100/人。

我和男友今天來是想找個地方坐著聊天休息，剛好看到這間。不過似乎是賣比較多酒類，可惜我們不是來喝酒的，無緣品嚐到這裡的美酒。

這裡位在小巷子裡，不太好找，今天來店裡一組客人都沒有，燈光非常昏暗，店員很親切的引領我們入座，我們坐得位置超級暗，只有桌上一盞燈籠，我覺得太暗眼睛不舒服，又因為會滑手機，所以後來都用一支手機開著手電筒照，不然我覺得眼睛會瞎掉…。

我們點了松露薯條$150和巧克力奶昔$160，薯條炸得非常酥脆，不過松露醬我個人覺得美乃滋的味道比較突出一點，沒有很喜歡，但是還算是好吃。
奶昔的部分我覺得不太ok，味道是奶昔沒有錯，冰淇淋的那種甜味，但是喝起來跟一般的巧克力牛奶一樣，沒有奶昔的稠度，甚至連很多店家會做成冰沙的感也沒有，喝了個寂寞😔。
對於很喜歡奶昔的我來說，是滿失望的。

這裡的氣氛不錯，價格也不會太高，也沒有用餐時限，也許剛好點到比較雷的品項，希望之後有機會來可以吃到其他美味的餐點！

強烈建議比較暗的座位可以多設置一些燈…，現在大部分的人喝酒聊天用餐幾乎都會用手機，光線不充足的情況下用手機真的眼睛不太舒服…
EN:
2024.07.19

The atmosphere is beautiful, suitable for dating dinner or friends who don't know where to go.There is no meal time limit, and low consumption is only $ 100/person.

My boyfriend and I came today to find a place to sit and chat and rest. I just saw this.However, it seems to sell more alcohol. Unfortunately, we are not here to drink, but we have no chance to taste the wine here.

This is located in the alley. It ’s not easy to find. There is no group of guests in the store today. The lights are very dim. The clerk is very cordially led to the seat. Dark eyes were uncomfortable, and because I would slide the mobile phone, I used a mobile phone to drive a flashlight with a mobile phone, otherwise I felt that my eyes would be blind ...

We ordered the truffle fans $ 150 and chocolate milkshake $ 160. French fries were very crispy, but I personally think that the taste of the truffle sauce is a bit prominent, but I do n’t like it, but it is delicious.
I do n’t think it ’s OK in the part of the milkshake. The taste is that the milkshake is not wrong. The sweetness of the ice cream, but it’ s the same as the general chocolate milk. I didn't feel it, I drank a lonely.
For me who likes milkshakes, I am disappointed.

The atmosphere here is good, the price will not be too high, and there is no meal time limit. Perhaps it is just ordering to compare the items of thunder. I hope there will be a chance to eat other delicious meals in the future!

It is strongly recommended that the darker seats can be set more lights ..., most people now drink and chat, eat, and eat almost all mobile phones. When the light is insufficient, the eyes are really not comfortable to use my mobile phone ...
